categories: Category:Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters

nodes.text: Star Wars 15 is the fifteenth issue of the 2020 comic series Star Wars, published by Marvel Comics. Part of the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters event, it was published July 28, 2021.

"FRIENDS AND ENEMIES" LUKE SKYWALKER embarks upon an
epic mission with WEDGE ANTILLES and the brave pilots of
STARLIGHT SQUADRON to rescue a lost division of the REBEL
FLEET. LEIA ORGANA, CHEWBACCA and LANDO CALRISSIAN
attempt to save HAN SOLO from the evil clutches of BOBA FETT.
But what hidden vision will the Force send to Luke about the
troubles to come?
